title: [VISUAL] Cosmic Reaver Kassadin Nether Blade (W) Bug
body: I noticed that {{champion:38}}'s Nether Blade (W) for the Cosmic Reaver skin is using default particles. On-hit aswell as Active.

replies.body:
Hi hi! 
Thanks for the report! We'll have a fix for this in 8.8; just verified a fix today. :)
